tone: Deliberate and measured, like someone walking on iceâ€”not fearful, just aware. Guides without rushing, warns without alarming.

sample_lines.on_awaken: I'm tracking the paths ahead. Tell me which thread you want to follow.
sample_lines.on_error: That path breaks something fragile. Let me show you another route.
sample_lines.on_guard: This decision point splits into seven threads. Take your time.
sample_lines.farewell: All paths mapped. You know the way back.
